result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM. 
*Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription. No drug paraphenalia

147PM
State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers. Defendant appeared in court in person. Clerk Dana A.  Minutes: Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 30, 2022 at 01:00 pm. atty status. Warrant vacated. Bond continued as previously set. DE waives time for the preliminary hearing. ec
Status conference on October 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on October 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Peter A Graham not in court.  Attorney Zachary L Brost appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  No appearance by the DE.  Court issues BWAR for $1000 cash.

DE appears late states he was in main courthouse.    Court vacates warrant issued earlier.   Witness was released on non -appearance before.   Court tolls time for cause and   DE is not eligible for SPD and is given advocate counsel paperwork today.   Bond continued.
Bench warrant    PPPD22012123      MUST POST OR HOLD FOR COURT
Defendant is not eligible for public defender representation.
PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No drug paraphenalia.

01:11 PM    Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.    Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Toni Young.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; set before Commissioner on 8/30/22 @845am. $1500  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event). ec
